name: Hentai Vs Orcs
description:
Hentai Vs Orcs is an Arena Shooter, with infinite waves of enemies

At castle an orcs invasion and your pretty shapes for stop them

Take part to i an epic combat which you will have access to a weapons arsenal with a recreative look.

But above all magic skills that will allow you to overcome your enemies.



  • Magic Abilities that allow you to heal yourself , deal big damage to your enemies but also stun them and give you a shield to protect yourself
  • Different Orcs with different abilities (Melee and Distance, Summon)
  • The Sexy Camera widget is always present for choose your favorite angles
  • Firearms (Assault Rifle, Shotgun, Sniper, Laser Rifle, Rocket Launcher)
  • Secondary Objectives
  • Pleasure Game Mode to enjoy without fighting
  • Boss Combat
